text: USA-181 was the first payload to be launched on the Delta IV Heavy rocket. == Launch == USA-181 launched on The Maiden Flight of the Delta IV Heavy Rocket on December 21, 2004, from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, LC-37B. == Description == USA-181 is permanently attached to the second stage of the first Delta IV Heavy rocket. == Conclusion == As of 2024 USA-181 remains in a Medium Earth Orbit attached to the First Delta IV Heavy rocket. Category:American satellites
title: USA-181
